content.title: Updating the Mapping Editor
content.body:
1. From the top-right corner of the Action Editor window, select Design View.
  2. Select Invoke Service name: RecipientStorage$Recipients$get.
  3. From the right pane, select Update Filter Query. 
    The Mapping Editor window appears.
  4. From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Services > Service – RecipientStorage$Recipients$get.
  5. Right-click and select Unbind for the following fields:
    • FirstName {string}
    • LastName {string}
    • NickName {string}
    • Phone {string}
  6. Click Save.
